item.title: CVE-2013-2255|2024-08-06T15:27:41.145Z -- openstack -- keystone
item.description: HTTPSConnections in OpenStack Keystone 2013, OpenStack Compute 2013.1, and possibly other OpenStack components, fail to validate server-side SSL certificates.
